DaysArts

Lifting People's Spirits

Daysland Palace Theatre

DaysArts, It is our mission to enhance the life of our community through the promotion and celebration of all aspects of art and culture.

Step into a world of entertainment at our theater, where captivating movies, exhilarating concerts, and lively dance classes bring your evenings to life!

Upcoming movies

Experience the magic of cinema like never before at our movie theatre. Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and captivating soundscapes that transport you right into the heart of the story. Join us for an unforgettable movie-going adventure where every showing is an event in itself!

  • Red One

    PG

    After Santa Claus is Kidnapped, the North Pole’s Head of Security must team up with a notorious hacker in a globe-trotting, action packed mission to save Christmas.

    •
  • Reel Alternative Film

    The Quiet Girl

    PG

    1981, Ireland. A 9-year-old girl from a dysfunctional family goes to live with distant relatives for the summer. Living with a middle-aged couple, she discovers a new way of living.

    •

  • Here

    PG

    A generational story about families and the special place they inhabit, sharing in love, loss, laughter, and life.

    •

  • Wicked

    PG

    Elphaba, a misunderstood young woman because of her green skin, and Glinda, a popular girl, become friends at Shiz University in the Land of Oz. After encounter with the Wonderful Wizard of Oz, their friendship reaches a crossroads.

    •

Upcoming events

Concert Series 2024

Get ready for an electrifying lineup of live performances and unforgettable experiences in our Concert Series 2024!

Blue Moon Marquee

Carving a path through blues, jazz, jump jive, swing, folk, country, and Indigenous soul, their sound defies category.

Jack Semple Plays Lightfoot

Ferocious guitar skills, beautiful vocals, and riveting performances have captured hearts across North America.

Molly's Comedy Cabaret

A musical variety show that mixes up a splash of comedy, a shot of zaniness and a large pour of your favorite songs.

Piano Heist

Determination to reinstate the keyboard as the greatest instrument of all time results in a bit of musical madness.

Becoming the Beatles | Unplugged

Combining 20 live songs and over 300 projected images, the story of one of the greatest bands of all times is told.

Rum Ragged

These new champions of East Coast music enlighten audiences with their brand of Newfoundland folk.

The Gift of Unforgettable Experiences!

Surprise your loved ones with DaysArts Gift Certificates - perfect for movies, events, and all the spectacular offerings at DaysArts.
